document.title: 2004 Directory of Tennessee Municipal Officials
document.abstract: A directory of Tennessee cities that includes personnel and municipal data, such as number of employees, population, charter form, size in square miles, and election date, for 2004.

field.name: comments
field.value: Tennessee municipalities were contacted once a year to update the information listed in this directory. Changes in that information may have occurred between the contact date and the date of this printed directory. For accurate historical information, please contact the municipality directly.
